attributes.action: Petition against controlled parking zone in Banbury Park / Billet Road Area.
attributes.additional_details:
Also, those dropping their children off to school will need to pay on average £21.00-£150.00 for a 15 minute drop off / pick up permit. 
If you would like to speak to your child's teacher and exceed the 15 minute permit you pay for, you are at risk of being issued with a parking fine for the amount of £65.00.
This is totally unacceptable.
attributes.background:
London borough of Waltham forest are looking to make Banbury Park / Billet Road area into permit holders only parking. 
To obtain a resident permit you will have to pay on average between £12.50-£215.00 a year.  For those working in area you will need to pay between £205.00-£910.00 a year.

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
